All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCRDT
    This is an abstract base class for CRDT classes.
    AbstractDataType
    This is the abstract base class for the test data elements which are coded as JSON objects in the CRDT elements under test
    AbstractNode
    The AbstractNode class establishes a base framework for derived classes to draw upon to manage a collection of CRDT objects
    AssessmentSupport
    The AssessmentSupport class is a base class for all of the unit test classes.
    CRDTManager
    The CRDTManager class is used to wrap a CRDT instance so as to interact with it.
    Executive
    The Executive class is used to manage the overall execution of the simulation of a distributed CRDT data store.
    Executive.EventType
    An enumeration of the types of operations which the executive is managing
    Factory
    This is a support class which is used to generate various objects related to the DataType class and its derived classes
    Factory.DataType
    An enumeration of the derived classes from DataTyep
    GenericCRDTManager<T>
    The Class GenericCRDTManager is used to manage a Plain Old Java Object (POJO).
    GenericManager<T>
    The Class GenericManager provides a simple mechanism for managing a POJO as a CRDT.
    GenericOperationManager<T>
    The Class GenericOperationManager provides a mechanism for managing java types as a CRDT by wrapping an object by a collection of operations on that object.
    IManager<T extends AbstractDataType>
    Interface for applying some basic ownership / management attributes to elements of the CRDT simulation environment.
    JsonManager
    The Class JsonManager provides a simple mechanism for managing raw JSON content as a CRDT.
    LastWriteWins
    The LastWriteWins class implements a Last Write Wins commutative CRDT.
    LastWriteWins.TrialResult
    The Class TrialResult is used to process a collection of operations provided to it.
    Message<T extends AbstractDataType>
    The Message class encapsulates a delivery mechanism for moving an operation generated at one node on a particular CRDT object to another Node so that it may be delivered to the corresponding CRDT at the destination node.
    MessageRouter
    The MessageRouter class is responsible for message delivery to the correct node in the distributed environment.
    Node
    The Node class models a node in a distributed data model.
    Operation
    The Operation class is intended to be a base / abstract class for the set of operations which would normally be expected to be performed on a persistence store.
    Operation.OperationType
    The Enum OperationType lists the types of operations which comprise the types of operations which can be performed on JSON objects
    OperationManager
    This is the base class for wrapping AbstractOperations.
    OperationManager.StatusType
    The Enum StatusType.
    OperationTwoSet
    This is an abstract class which defines a Two Set CRDT.
    SimCRDTManager<T extends AbstractDataType>
    The Class SimCRDTManager is used to manage a Plain Old Java Object (POJO).
    SimOperationManager<T extends AbstractDataType>
    The SimOperationManager class wraps JSON operations with some management code to ensure proper delivery and processing of the operations specifically tailored for the simulation test harness.
    SimpleBoolean
    This is a concrete class type derived from AbstractDataType used to test the CRDT.
    SimpleCollection
    This is a concrete class type derived from AbstractDataType used to test the CRDT.
    SimpleDouble
    This is a concrete class type derived from AbstractDataType used to test the CRDT.
    SimpleInteger
    This is a concrete class type derived from AbstractDataType used to test the CRDT.
    SimpleReference
    This is a concrete class type derived from AbstractDataType used to test the CRDT.
    SimpleString
    This is a concrete class type derived from AbstractDataType used to test the CRDT.
    Support
    This is a helper class for generating a number of random values useful for testing the CRDTs
    TestCrdt
    This contains a class used for performing unit tests designed to create a number of AbstractDataType instances using the factory.
    TestCrdt.Generic  
    TestCrdt.Json  
    TestData
    This contains a class used for performing unit tests designed to create a number of AbstractDataType instances using the factory.
    TestData.Clone  
    TestData.Create  
    TestData.Update  
    TestOperator
    This contains a class used for performing unit tests designed to create a number of AbstractDataType instances using the factory.
    TestOperator.Operator  
    TestSimulation
    This test module will assess the behavior of the CRDT through the use of a simulated distributed node controller and update delivery framework.
    TestSimulation.Simulation
